title: Social Media-Based Science Learning Simulation Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Students actively using social media in daily life but with limited educational application, comprising a cohort with collaborative problem-solving experiences in VR/simulation environments

learning_goals: Students can share and analyze scientific experiment data using social media tools.
Learners solve scientific problems using social media-based collaboration tools in a VR simulation environment.
By the end of the course, students can systematically explain the educational advantages and limitations of social media.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
